Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to permitting employees of public utilities access to certain restroom facilities without being a paying customer
Summary: Permits employees of public utility corporations or public utility companies access to certain restroom facilities without being a paying customer.
LawCode: Add ยง399-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to permitting employees of public utilities access to certain restroom facilities without being a paying customer
